text: Motion
Motion

They called us a
"miracle"......or something, right?

I think that’s actually
pretty true.

Really?
......I didn’t like that way of putting it.
It sounds like it ignores all the work we’ve done.

Oh, no, I mean like,
not about the performances and stuff──......
......Then what?

Our way of meeting?
Something like that.
Our way of meeting, huh?

All of us were scouted
by the Producer, right?

I think that’s pretty amazing......
It’s not strange to call that a miracle......!
......In what way?

Um......in other words～......
......Producer! Pass!

Haha......but it’s true.
There is an element of luck in scouting.

For example, if I had gone to a different place or if you all
were in different situations, I might not have spoken to you.

The fact that all these coincidences lined up and you joined 283,
and now we’re working together, that’s the "miracle".

Exactly!!
Perfect explanation, Producer～♪

If I had been doing something else,
would you not have spoken to me, Producer-san?

I’d like to say we would have met in another way......
but the timing was certainly crucial.
I see.

......Well, whether it’s a "miracle" or something else,
we don’t really know, do we?
